website_summaries.verdict: Vitamin C and AHA combine in this lightweight serum that illuminates and smooths skin for a more even skin tone.
pros: A comprehensive brightening product that works great for acne-prone skin
cons: Not all skin types react well

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: So my combination skin has been tripping for a little over a year. I've discovered several products to help, but this is one of the best ice stumbled upon. After the first application, my skin felt soft and was less red. I did notice some little bumps, but they weren't pimples. By the 3rd application (I use it every other day) my skin was totally smooth and my pores look smaller than ever. This continues to this day! Highly recommended. FYI: the English translation says to rub it into your skin for 10-15 minutes, but you just rub it for a few seconds and leave it on for 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that some people said their products were expired. Well, I am not Korean but I did look up the words on google and if you love to learn new things, the first Hangul characters mean manufactured date which is 2017-11-27 and the second Hangul characters mean expiration date which is 2020-05-26. So my product isn’t expired at all. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reformulated??
customer_reviews.text: I think I last used this mask in 2017/early 2018. The consistency and beads in the jar I got is pretty different from what I used previously. It's runnier and the "beads" are a bit harder and more distinct, so it feels rougher on the skin. I'm disappointed, but maybe someone else will prefer this consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Feng

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Skin Food products before, and this particular item was a gift for my mother. She has used it a few times since receiving it, and her first comment was, "It makes my skin feel like a baby's!" It is a very gentle exfoliant with a light, pleasant smell. I've used the black sugar one; and in comparison, this one has finer granules and feels much more gentle on the skin. Perfect for those that have normal to dry skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Akea

customer_reviews.title: The perfect in-between for my unpredictable skin
customer_reviews.text: I really can't stress how much I love this. I bought it on impulse, wasn't sure I should have, and now have found a favorite. My skin is... complicated. This is really a nice product, leaves my skin feeling very clean and fresh while not too dry. Now I am really glad I tried this.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Nice Exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Skin Food products are often very effective for my oily skin. This product, does just that. At first when I tried this product at one of the Skin Food stores, I didn't like the fact that the mask wasn't harsh enough for my skin. I always assumed that the more beads there are in a product, the most effective the exfoliator would be. This product proves that is not the case. I prefer this Skin Food Rice Mask compared to the Black Sugar Mask. The rice mask makes my skin feel soft and smooth without the abrasiveness of harsh exfoliating beads like the Black Sugar Mask. I would definitely recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Dina C

customer_reviews.title: Shipping could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to try this out to see what it could do for my skin. As far as I can tell my skin has gotten slightly lighter and it's very moisturizing. However when I received the Skinfood Rice Mask Wash off something got inside the package and making everything wet. On the outside of the container but everything else was fine with it. It wasn't broken but something like water got in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Strong alcohol smell
customer_reviews.text: This rice mask stings and gave me rashes. My seller is skinfood so im pretty sure it is authentic. It reeks of alcohol upon opening and it stings after leaving it on for a couple of mins. I used it twice with 1 week apart, each time i used it gave me rashes. Very dissapointed since their sugar mask worked ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: zjydelacruz

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my dry skin. It's a gentler exfoliator than the black sugar mask. This product helped clear my skin and reduce inflammation. I thought it wouldn't be rough enough but the rice particles in the mask are surprisingly effective. I actually prefer it to the black sugar mask. I can use it without moisturizer and my face is still slightly moisturized. It's unfortunate the product breaks some people out.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Great mask that leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites masks! This mask has a nice creamy texture with bits of rice. I apply it on my face, then rub it in and let it sit for 15-20 minutes then rinse off with water. Makes my skin feel so soft and smooth and brightens up my complexion. I have incorporated this mask into my new K-beauty routine and am very happy with the results. I have been using this mask after I use a clay mask and it helps alleviate any dryness that I get from clay masks. My skin can be sensitve and this mask has not irritated me at all. Very pleased with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, but it doesn't exfoliate either
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mask that would provide some gentle exfoliation for my ultra-sensitive skin. Lot of masks give my skin a burning sensation if they are heavily perfumed or too astringent. This one didn't irritate my skin at all, and seems relatively moisturizing, but if you're looking for even light exfoliation, this will not supply it.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face looking clear and refreshed/feeling moisturized. Light exfoliator!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good mild exfoliator/mask! Where do I start? It leaves your face feeling moisturized/clean with the stripped feeling of regular exfoliators. It's perfect if you have very sensitive face like me and cant handle regular exfoliators. I finally found a exfoliator for my sensitive/redness prone face. I've used this a few times and same results every time. I love it. Get this if regular exfoliators are too heavy and get this if you want a nice moisturizing mask that leaves your face looking refreshed and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The directions indicate that you must massage this into your skin for 10-15 minutes. My hands became tired after five minutes. I think that anything will make your skin feel better if you massage it into your skin for that long! Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: lynda kosnik

customer_reviews.title: Works as a good exfoliating moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It’s sticky it’s thick. The smell is fine. You do have to rub it in for like ten or fifteen minutes. But my skin feels nice after. I don’t notice crazy difference like some say. It’s just a good exfoliate. And moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyKens

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Helped the texture of my skin and pigmentation. I have super sensitive skin(dry acne prone with eczema), but this didn't give me any issues. At one point I used it every morning before school and it helped a lot, but then I ran out.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST SKIN SCRUBS - LEAVES SKIN BABY SOFT
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an abrasive scrub... I’ve used their black sugar scrub - which is also great but definitely grittier (if that’s even a good description). It smells good - not overpowering but clean - feels milky and creamy going on - and then so baby soft and clean when you remove it. I’d like to use it daily but I do it twice a week only
customer_reviews.author: alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Not for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: This product did not live up to my expectations (which were high) because of the scrubbing technique. I have combination skin, so on the oily parts of my skin I thought it would be okay, but even rubbing it for 5 minutes ruins skin texture (regardless of where I scrubbed it). Also, not really sure if there is just a language barrier miscommunication in the instructions since it says to massage it in for 15 minutes. I was not as satisfied with the product for its intended use, however, it could be used for crafts like slime-making, etc. Haven't used it more than twice :/
customer_reviews.author: Karis

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Customer!
customer_reviews.text: My face feels amazing after using this. I typically use this after a good exfoliating and my face feels so incredible and hydrated after use. I’ve had this for a few months and have barely made a dent, a little goes a long way. I will definitely repurchase whenever I run out....you have a loyal customer in me Skinfood
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: ... rice grains aren't enough to exfoliate at all but good as massage
customer_reviews.text: Cooked soft rice grains aren't enough to exfoliate at all but good as massage. It feels so nice on! Wash off after about 15-20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: All time fav!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It very gently exfoliates while moisturizing. My skin always looks better after I use it. I’ve purchased it multiple times and it remains a staple in my routin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbearably scented!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind fragrance in my skincare products, but this wAs so heavily fragrant that it irritated my skin, and I don't have super sensitive skin. Also the consistency is super runny which I did not expect at all. Super disappointed by this.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Ching

customer_reviews.title: Byeee acne scarsss👻
customer_reviews.text: So here's what's up I've been using this product since July. Yes, July and honestly my skin does look better. My acne scars have been fading away and every time I use it my complexion looks better. I still have very bad acne scars that look like holes , but the product can only do so much. I did not have any allergic reaction my skin felt soft after use. The acne scars probably faded after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Elle92729

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask for brightening
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this mask works wonders !! I use it at night and in the morning my face looks plump, healthy and bright.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin break out after 3 months of not having breakouts. So I’m returning
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Good for rebalancing skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Good for rebalancing skin, makes your skin smooth as a baby's butt and glorious like an angel. Your face will be made out of angels and babies, maybe even baby Angels! I left it on for like 20 minutes once and it kinda turned my face red and sensitive so stick to the instructions. A+
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee it!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I see the difference immediately every time I use it. I just re-order another one. My new holy grail!
customer_reviews.author: Jaria A.

customer_reviews.title: ... after getting the black sugar scrub and falling in love. has a slimy texture
customer_reviews.text: i bought this after getting the black sugar scrub and falling in love. has a slimy texture, but it's easy to apply and a little goes a long way. my skin was so soft after using it, but without any greasiness or tight/dry feeling.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: This skin good facial mask is the best of all. My skin glows after using it and it makes my skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita Lama

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It gave a light scent which I loved. The rice in the mask feels very gentle. Good for exfoliating and a leisure daily mask to use. Have been using for months and the results are absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.author: Wei. A

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, not sure if exfoliates well
customer_reviews.text: Bought many years ago and finally doing a review. Moisturizing, maybe too much for oily skin but ok for normal to drier skin. Scent is not too bothersome, like a light white fresh floral green scent. Doesn't smell like rice or freshly cooked rice. Don't think it exfoliates well. Didn't feel like it was sloughing off too much or not enough dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Liath

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves it!
customer_reviews.text: A friend introduced me to this mask and I’ve loved it since. The mask is cooling, and very moisturizing. My skin always feels rejuvenated and refreshed after using it.
customer_reviews.author: CKDexter-Haven

customer_reviews.title: Help skin texture definitely.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s an amazing soft scrub and mask that leaves your skin so soft and calm. I like the smell and the texture of this mask and it’s helping my skin texture and pores so much, I will definitely buy it again and I recommend this completely. In addition it arrived fast and the package was in good conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: Great product but strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. It brightens my skin after washing. I take off 1 star cus of its very strong fragrance. The black sugar mask doesn't smell this strong. When i have a headache, I stay away from the rice mask.
customer_reviews.author: Anh N. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight fragrance to this. It’s a very mild exfoliant. I like that it doesn’t strip my skin. I’ve noticed it helps with my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Kellena

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! My skin felt SUPER soft after this scrub. It's a gentle scrub, it totally did not remove any of my black heads (obviously) BUT it did soften the texture I would feel on my nose. Its a really good scrub, I'm mostly using it for my hyper pigmentation. I will find out later if its working.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: It is very gentle scrub. I have been using it almost everyday for my sensitive skin. Hasn’t experienced any allergic reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Heavily fragranced
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged very well. Expiration date was for 2023. This mask is nice but fragranced and burned my face
customer_reviews.author: Tristion stuart

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is hypersensitive. My face got itchy for the next day. I tried it once and it was not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: I feel like it dries out my face and causes me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously was using Skinfood's Black Sugar scrub and wanted to try this out because the sugar scrub sometimes feels too rough. While the rice mask feels very soft in comparison, I feel like it dries out my face and causes me to breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It makes my face feel soft and smooth. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B King

customer_reviews.title: Feeling clean.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, it gently, but thoroughly cleans my sensitive skin. Very happy with this product and will definitely order again - especially at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia407

customer_reviews.title: Followed the direction and it made my skin look like new born baby skin
customer_reviews.text: Followed the direction and it made my skin look like new born baby skin. :) I love Korean beauty products!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels softer
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaves my face feeling super fresh and soft after use. It hasn't caused me any problems (I break out and seldom have oily or dry skin). It doesn't improve my skin as far as acne or dryness, but it's a good refresher to use once a week before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Not exfoliating like claimed, but really hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: The “rice” bits feel more like gelatinous microbeads, and really don’t do anything for “exfoliating”. However, this mask is super hydrating and smells awesome! It’s also quite gentle, which my delicate skin needs. If you need the exfoliation, definitely go for the Skinfood Black sugar mask, they’re perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask so much
customer_reviews.text: My second time purchasing this mask but I've bought a bigger container because this works so well! There's virtually no smell and the scrub is very gentle. I like leaving it on for about 20 minutes and slowly wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Sosin

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best facial mask I have seen. Does not do anything to my skin and the rice particles are too big. The just scratch your skin but do not really get into your pores. Also very watery.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates well
customer_reviews.text: This mask feels like it exfoliates the skin very well. It does not dry my face out either.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Swank

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as original
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for a mask, provides some moisturizing effect, but far from the black sugar or the strawberry one which usually leaves my skin feeling silky for a day or so. This one, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for acne prone people
customer_reviews.text: I have dehydrated, combination skin that is very prone to breakouts. This mask breaks me out HORRIBLY every time I try it out. It did nothing to improve my skins appearance overall.
customer_reviews.author: workinmom

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: It is nice a creamy and leaves my skin so soft after.
customer_reviews.author: Anneline Moore

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed and Possibly used face mask.
customer_reviews.text: The face mask was unsealed and looked like it had been used unfortunately. Other than that it would’ve been a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Myriah

customer_reviews.title: not really a scrub but its a nice in between so my skin doesn't get scrubbed too ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light, not really a scrub but its a nice in between so my skin doesn't get scrubbed too much between the sugar rubs
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: i wood definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: this leaves your skin moisturized for longer. i wood definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Prasan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for beauty fanatics
customer_reviews.text: One of the best masks I’ve ever used. Actually feels like it is useful and the results last more than a day. I love using this in the morning or night, since it’s so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: KCDC8796

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and sensitive skin overall and this is perfect to use every night it every other night whenever you feel your face needs it. Buying it for the 3rd time
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan F

customer_reviews.title: Make your skin smooth but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and I tried it right away. I makes your face so smooth I just don’t like the texture that’s why I’m giving 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireBear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice Face Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Great face mask! Although, it does burn a little, but think it is due to my skin condition. Not the mask itself. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It makes my face feel soft and smooth. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Korchi

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO PERFUME-Y!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so heavily scented it is practically unusable. I tested this on my hand just to see how it performs but I cannot imagine putting this on my face. And unfortunately this item cannot be returned. What a bummer. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: erica h

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing! It's great and soft wash off for the face. I only complain that I have dry skin and this does leave my skin dryer so i must moisturize after using. But it helps with my acne as well so I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Above average mask
customer_reviews.text: Strange consistency with actual rice in it. Hard to get an even layer on your face. Pretty moisturizing, didn’t notice much brightening.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliator or Mask
customer_reviews.text: Really nice exfoliator, I sometimes wear it as a mask, sometimes I massage it on my face as a way to remove dead skin. Either way my skin is soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! It removes imperfections and nurtures my skin at same time! Skin feels so smooth after using the mask. Love Skin Food products!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this scrub was gentle, easy to use, and made my skin feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but I wish they’d been more careful with the shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This has always been my fave Skinfood mask but I wish they’d been more careful in terms of shipping and handling the product as it spilled around the plastic wrap it came with and I’m left with 50% of the product content 😢
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes use it as a wash versus a mask. It leaves my skin soft and smooth. It also seems to slightly fade dark spots. It reminds me of a milky tapioca.
customer_reviews.author: Archea L. Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent exfoliate and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Light smell, not too harsh. The instructions say to massage this into your skin for several minutes, but if I did that I wouldn't have a face left. It is an excellent exfoliate and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: The must- have mask
customer_reviews.text: You will have a soft and bright skin after you wash this stuff off. It is an amazing feeling when all of dirt and oily are flushed away from my skin by this rice mask. It has fine rice-base scrub that doesn't scratch your skin at all. My skin is sensitive but I don't have any problem with the formula of this mask. Before using this stuff, I often washed my face with rice water. Rice make the skin soft and radiant. With this philosophy, the rice mask would have the same effect to your skin. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Yogurt_Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Makes my skin look perfect, smooth, bright, and dewy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks to post a review on this product just to see how well it would work. Overall, I am impressed my skin feels smoother and more firm, the only issue I have with this mask is the smell. I was hoping it would have a more earthy smell. I do recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ash H

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed, though
customer_reviews.text: My skin definitely feels cleaner and whiter after using it. I was a bit disappointed, though, because the product is more of a long scrub (you massage it for 10-15 minute and then wash it off) rather than a mask that you just leave on. It doesn't have a strong smell, which I really like, and the scrub is not too rough on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and no scent
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have a strong scent to it. It exfoliates softly with the rice rubbing on your skin. After washing my face, it leaves my face feeling soft. Would recommend it to this who needs an exfoliator with no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Vangg

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this face mask. The tub looks small, but little goes a long way. I've had this for over 6 months, I use it twice a week, and I am only barely halfway through with it. In terms of brightening, I'm not sure how effective it is because I don't notice any huge changes in my skintone. But I LOVE how soft it makes my face feel afterwards. Purchased this for a friend and they are obsessed with it as well. Highly recommend to try this out at least once!!
customer_reviews.author: AHGASE852

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive, Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Does not do anything special, not worth 20 bucks it’s just a regular product put it on and wash off it does not make any difference and you get a very small amount Good to have for the 8 to $10 range
customer_reviews.author: Corina Perez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash! Not only does it smell nice but it’s gentle on the skin. I notice that after I used it that the bumps on my skin diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Slyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that breaks out here and there. And I am telling you, this thing cannot possibly irritate the most sensitive of skin (but of course test on your inner wrist to see if you react before applying on your face). I gave 4 stars because I wish it was a tad bit more abrasive, but overall it's an awesome product. I use it in the bath and massage on my face for about 10 minutes before rinsing - super relaxing! A great moisturizing scrub for dry/sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice to use and makes your skin feel squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: good for my skin
customer_reviews.text: it really helped with my acne especially during my PMS when pimples are popping up all over my face. it made me feel fresh after washing it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ryn Lois Funtilon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use it twice a week and really enjoyed the results. It definitely makes my face feel so soft and it’s also has a little bit of a brightening affect. Good price for what it is!
customer_reviews.author: Nchurazki

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice this rice wash off mask was. It was easy to use and after my skin was very smooth. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great and smells good! I will definitely be buying more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good but contains microplastics
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a pretty good cleanser. Smells and feels quite nice. The exfoliant beads seem to be microplastics though, which wasn't clear before I bought it and flushing several ounces of the stuff into the environment isn't a great feeling.
customer_reviews.author: louis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s not too harsh on the skin & leaves the skin clean & bright.
customer_reviews.author: Samir & Lopa Kapur

customer_reviews.title: It's not that amazing if I'm honest - not the greatest consistency and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations of this product. I was wowed the first time I used it and I could have sworn that my skin felt sooo much softer! It's not that amazing if I'm honest - not the greatest consistency and it hasn't lighted or brightened my complexion after a month of use. It's okay. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Not rough or abrasive, but it sure does get the job done! I use this about once a week adn love how soft and smooth it makes my face feel. has a very light refreshing scent.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask for daily use
customer_reviews.text: The mask smells pleasant is non abrasive yet works excellent as an exfoliater. It is gentle enough to use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. However, I notice that if I use it too often, my skin looks weird. My skin is dark brown. It gives my face an ashy look if I use it daily. Because of that I use it only once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why not
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this. I like the smell and it left my skin feeling pretty soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfy ! Perfect consitancy ! Not runny. After wash off, skin feels soft and hydrate instantly ! Highly recommend people to try and will continue buying it !
customer_reviews.author: Sa Sa

customer_reviews.title: It's the one product that my skin isn't sensitive to and it's amazing. Leaves my face smooth and clear

customer_reviews.text: Works really well and smells really good as well. Good purchase. Well worth it. The container was also bigger than I expected. Should last a while

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite mask
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite mask. I actually like this one more than the other black sugar scrub mask. It's really soothing and definitely brightens my complexion.

customer_reviews.title: The smell is fine and it isnt too harsh
customer_reviews.text: I've used it only once. The smell is fine and it isnt too harsh. Afterwards though, my face felt so soft.

customer_reviews.title: lovely rice mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! it feels so soft whenever I applied it on my face, and it smells really nice too; a faint rice milky smell, not very strong either. After i wash my face off with water, my skin immediately feels refreshed and smooth!

customer_reviews.text: Good for sensitive skin. It might be drying but just moisturize after.

product_meta.title: SKINFOOD Rice Mask Wash Off 3.53 oz (100g) - Rice Exfoliating Wash Off Scrub Mask for Darken Skin
product_meta.description: Size:100g/3.52ozOne of the most famous brarns in Korea "Skinfood". It is very well known in worldwide. It has been for great quality with reasonable price.
feature_bullets: Instant improvement for dull skin tone.
How to Use : After cleansing, apply a thick layer on the entire face avoiding the eye and lip area, then wash off with lukewarm water after 5 minutes.
Instant brightening effect : 20 percent Cheorwon Odae rice bran water Brightens the skin tone immediately after application.
Powerful skin brightening effect by Rice Nuruk Fermented WaterTM which is highly enriched with the active ingredients of Cheorwon Odae rice.
